text: Cottonwood Island is an island in the U.S. state of Washington. The island lies in the Columbia River between Kalama, Washington and the cities of Longview and Kelso, Washington further downstream. Cottonwood Island was named after a grove of cottonwood trees on the island. ==References== Category:Landforms of Cowlitz County, Washington Category:River islands of Washington (state)
title: Cottonwood Island (Washington)
